mapper.update:
insert into t_safe_training_depart( `ID`, `OperDate`, `CreateDate`, `AutoID`, `OperUser`, `CreateUser`, `ParentID`, `DepartCode`, `ParentCode`, `DepartName`, `DepartType`, `DepartShortName`, `DepartOrder`, `State`, `DepartSir`, `DepartTel`, `IsEpiboly`, `Remark`, `Phone`, `Charge`, `AreaCode`, `AreaID`, `Finished`, `ItemType` ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.operDate}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.autoID}, #{item.operUser}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.parentID}, #{item.departCode}, #{item.parentCode}, #{item.departName}, #{item.departType}, #{item.departShortName}, #{item.departOrder}, #{item.state}, #{item.departSir}, #{item.departTel}, #{item.isEpiboly}, #{item.remark}, #{item.phone}, #{item.charge}, #{item.areaCode}, #{item.areaID}, #{item.finished}, #{item.itemType} )
on duplicate key update ID = values(ID),operDate=values(operDate),operUser=values(operUser),parentID=values(parentID), departCode=values(departCode),departName=values(departName),departType=values(departType),departShortName=values(departShortName), departOrder=values(departOrder),state=values(state),departSir=values(departSir),departTel=values(departTel),isEpiboly=values(isEpiboly), remark=values(remark),phone=values(phone),charge=values(charge),areaCode=values(areaCode),areaID=values(areaID),finished=values(finished), itemType=values(itemType),DepartName=values(departName)
mapper.select: select ID, OperDate, CreateDate, AutoID, OperUser, CreateUser, ParentID, DepartCode, ParentCode, DepartName, DepartType, DepartShortName, DepartOrder, State, DepartSir, DepartTel, IsEpiboly, Remark, Phone, Charge, AreaCode, AreaID, Finished, ItemType FROM t_safe_training_depart
mapper.update:
insert into t_safe_training_code( `ID`, `OperDate`, `CreateDate`, `AutoID`, `OperUser`, `CreateUser`, `CodeName`, `CodeContent`, `CodeOrder`, `Remark`, `KindID`, type ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.operDate}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.autoID}, #{item.operUser}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.codeName}, #{item.codeContent}, #{item.codeOrder}, #{item.remark}, #{item.kindID}, #{item.type} )
on duplicate key update ID = values(ID),operDate=values(operDate),operUser=values(operUser),codeName=values(codeName), codeContent=values(codeContent),codeOrder=values(codeOrder),remark=values(remark),kindId=values(kindID),type=values(type)
